name: ogre-js
description: Object graph manager, built with ReactJS in mind.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build-test && mocha
scripts.build-test: coffee -b -c -j test/all-tests.js test/src/test-helpers.coffee test/src/test-api.coffee test/src/test-flows.coffee test/src/misc-test.coffee
scripts.min: uglifyjs ogre.js -o ogre.min.js -c -m --preamble "/* ogre.js - MIT Licensed - http://github.com/elucidata/ogre.js */"
scripts.dist: npm run test && npm run min

author: Matt McCray <matt@elucidata.net>
